name: Bald Shaves The World
description:
Team Tree Of Salts: 

  1. Hendy Utomo P (145150200111032)
  2. Billy Kaleb Hananto (145150200111012)
  3. Mikhanael M P Simanjuntak (145150207111107)
  4. Billawal Nadipa Pelealu (145150201111014)

You play as a bald knight, trying to s(h)ave the world from monster by slashing them one by one. But be careful don't get hit because You Only Live Once.

Gameplay:   

  • Slash as many monsters as possible
  • Earn point by killing monsters
  • The more enemies you kill, they'll respawn more faster

Control:

  • W, A, S, D to move around
  • Hold Space to Attack

Source code can be found on Github

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game ini dibuat dengan pembagian:

Mikha & Billawal : Asset, Artist, UI
Billy & Hendy : Mechanic, Rendering

Dikarenakan kesalahan tidak back-up aplikasi dan error
pada hardisk salah satu anggotagame menjadi berbeda dari
design awal dan UI tidak sempurna

Waktu pengerjaan hanya 4 - 5 hari, mohon maaf sebelumnya
